atten2.ptxt: Remove the back door stay while holding the back door.

item.ptxt: Do not touch the extendable portion of the rod to prevent foreign objects from attaching to the back door stay surface.
Do not push the back door stay sideways because the back door stay may bend.
Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR STAY ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 4 bolts and back door stay.

atten2.ptxt: Remove the back door stay while holding the back door.
